high_descs: Pick up the CD on the windowsill.
anns.task_desc: View a CD by the light of a lamp.

high_descs: Turn right and walk to the AC
Grab the CD on the AC
anns.task_desc: Grab the CD on the AC, turn on the lamp on the table

high_descs: Turn right head towards the wall a few steps and then turn left towards the bench.
Pick up the CD on the bench.
Turn on the lamp on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Examine a CD by the light of a lamp.
